archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Optometric Records of Keller & George Jewelers
1899-1936

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is not available for use until early 2012. Please contact Special Collections for additional information.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Optometric Records of Keller & George Jewelers, 1899-1936, Accession #11301, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These bound volumes of optometric records were given to the Library on April 15, 1997, by Keller & George Jewelers, Inc. of Charlottesville, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: There are 121 bound volumes, 1899-1936, containing records of optometric examinations kept by Keller & George Jewelers, Inc. of Charlottesville, Virginia. These record books contain concise records of examinations made and glasses prescribed and furnished. Name indexes are included in the volumes from February 1899 until September 1926. There are records kept for: objective examinations including ophthalmoscope, skiascope and keratometer; subjective examinations including trial lenses, muscle test, and dynamic refraction; glasses prescribed; and, dimensions for frames.
